channel.title: Tax Incentives on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Tax Incentives on FinanClub

item.title: GM
item.description: score:32 Chances: General Motors is making significant efforts to qualify its Cadillac Lyriq and Chevrolet Blazer EV for U.S. electric vehicle tax credits, which could potentially lead to increased sales and market competitiveness. The adoption of Tesla’s EV charging standard by Volkswagen AG may reflect positively on the electric vehicle industry as a whole, potentially benefiting General Motors’ EV offerings in the long term.
